noun.description: A small firearm designed to be held in one hand.
A very energetic or enterprising person.
examples: when we first met, he was a pistol, full of ideals and a natural leader

origin: Mid 16th century: from obsolete French pistole, from German Pistole, from Czech pišt'ala, of which the original meaning was whistle, hence a firearm by the resemblance in shape.
